verses.name: Hosea 9:10
verses.text: I found Israel like grapes in the wilderness; I saw your fathers as the firstripe in the fig tree at her first time: but they went to Baal–peor, and separated themselves unto that shame; and their abominations were according as they loved.

verses.name: Hosea 9:11
verses.text: As for Ephraim, their glory shall fly away like a bird, from the birth, and from the womb, and from the conception.

verses.name: Hosea 9:12
verses.text: Though they bring up their children, yet will I bereave them, that there shall not be a man left: yea, woe also to them when I depart from them!
